\subsection[research-interests]{Research Interests:}

\startdescription{{\em EcoEvo}}
  {\bf Food webs}; Food webs assembly and dynamics; their response to
  anthropic pressure; the role of species interactions in ecosystems and
  their drivers.

  {\bf Phylogenetics}; Evolutionary models and their possible extension
  to handle the effects of species interaction: ecology-aware
  phylogenetics analysis.

  {\bf Network evolution} The origin, evolution and dismantling of
  ecological networks; the effect of speciation/extinction events on
  ecosystems.
\stopdescription

\startdescription{{\em Networks}}
  {\bf Local/Global properties}; The connection between local and global
  network properties, such as centralities, motifs, dynamical stability.
\stopdescription

\startdescription{{\em Maths}}
  Phylogenetic Comparative Methods; Dynamical processes on and of
  Complex Networks; Networks statistical modelling and analysis; Random
  Matrices.
\stopdescription

\subsection[skills]{Skills}

\startdescription{Maths and Stats}
  Modelling and investigation of {\bf random networks} models;\crlf
   Nonlinear {\bf Dynamical Systems};\crlf
   {\bf Data Analysis} for biology;\crlf
   Evolutionary {\bf Game Theory};\crlf
   {\bf Probability}; Stochastic {\bf Differential Equations}.
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Programming}
  {\bf Julia}, {\bf Python}, {\bf R}: Major research activity, advanced
  skills.\crlf
   {\bf C}, {\bf C++}, {\bf Java}, {\bf Fortran}, {\bf Pascal}: Minor
  research or study experience, basic skills.\crlf
   {\bf Matlab}: Three years as tutor for a course in mathematical
  modelling.\crlf
   {\bf HTML}, {\bf CSS}, {\bf LaTeX}, {\bf markdown}, etc. .
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Outreach}
  5+ years working experience as science communicator, journalist, and
  event organizer; two years as marketing and project manager.

  proficiency.
\stopdescription

  first year students (Dept. of Mathematics, UniTrento, 2 years).
\stopdescription
